channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 亚马逊无处不在的送货车采用了 Rivian 的电动化版本。丹-尼尔（Dan Neil）驾驶它运送包裹。
item.description:
The ubiquitous Amazon delivery van comes in a fleet-footed electrified version from Rivian. Dan Neil takes it on a package run. https://t.co/pLm5EicynS https://t.co/pLm5EicynS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 水原一平（Ippei Mizuhara）被指控从大谷翔平（Shohei Ohtani）那里窃取了数百万美元，他不仅仅是一名俱乐部翻译。他与大谷翔平的关系越来越密切，几乎控制了他生活的方方面面。
item.description:
Ippei Mizuhara, who is accused of stealing millions of dollars from Shohei Ohtani, was more than just a clubhouse translator. He grew so close to Ohtani that he controlled almost every aspect of his life. https://t.co/lvaUDYKVrs https://t.co/lvaUDYKVrs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: Truth Social 的经营业绩不佳。然而，这可能是唐纳德-特朗普做过的最好的投资。以下是这位前总统如何赚取数十亿美元以及何时能从投资中获利的信息。
item.description:
Truth Social has performed poorly as a business. Yet it could be the best investment Donald Trump has ever made. Here’s how the former president could make billions and when he might be able to profit from his investment. https://t.co/7d3gVPyRar https://t.co/7d3gVPyRar

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：乔-利伯曼写道：舒默参议员的发言无疑让批评以色列的美国人感到高兴，但对以色列人来说，这是毫无意义、无端和冒犯性的。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: While Sen. Schumer’s statement undoubtedly pleased American critics of Israel, for the Israelis it was meaningless, gratuitous and offensive, writes @JoeLieberman https://t.co/mSe54Buorf https://t.co/mSe54Buorf

item.title: Reddit 股价在周四的股市首日大涨。公司股票在纽约证券交易所上市首日的收盘价为 50.44 美元，比发行价上涨了 48%。
item.description:
Reddit shares soared in their stock-market debut Thursday. The company’s shares closed at $50.44 on their first day of trading on the New York Stock Exchange, up 48% from their offer price. https://t.co/0wEaJEIveP https://t.co/0wEaJEIveP

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 犹太教拉比沙伊-黑尔德认为，人们所熟知的基督教讲爱而犹太教讲法的观点是对犹太教传统的误解。
item.description:

item.title: 潮一代移民正在重塑住房价格、交通模式、餐厅选择，以及地方政府如何应对他们以前从未处理过的问题：爆炸式增长
item.description:
The boomer migration is reshaping housing prices, traffic patterns, restaurant options and how local governments cope with something they haven’t had to handle before: explosive growth https://t.co/t6rwG0YHl9 https://t.co/t6rwG0YHl9

item.title: 马丁-格林菲尔德（Martin Greenfield）于周三去世，他在大屠杀中幸存下来，后来为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）、勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）设计服装。他是美国制造业为何重要的非官方发言人。
item.description:
Martin Greenfield, who died Wednesday, survived the Holocaust and went on to dress Donald Trump, LeBron James and Barack Obama. He was an unofficial spokesman for why American manufacturing matters. https://t.co/zNy3pmSBfe https://t.co/zNy3pmSBfe

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 来自雅卡玛族的语言学家弗吉尼亚-贝弗特（Virginia Beavert）与他人合作编写了第一本萨哈普廷语词典，并建立了教授这种传统上没有文字记载的语言的基础设施。
item.description:
A linguist from the Yakama Nation, Virginia Beavert co-wrote the first Sahaptin dictionary and built the infrastructure to teach a language that wasn’t traditionally written down https://t.co/1UfhKhaIRy https://t.co/1UfhKhaIRy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 斡旋大会能否取代拜登总统？历史学家爱德华-阿乔恩（Edward Achorn）写道，历史表明这将非常困难，但并非不可能。
item.description:
Could a brokered convention replace President Biden? History suggests that it would be very difficult—but not impossible, writes historian Edward Achorn. https://t.co/7kAu6nI02f https://t.co/7kAu6nI02f

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 为什么没有更多的东西像汽车一样需要召回？专栏作家乔-奎纳（Joe Queenan）提出了一些候选方案，比如他外套上的故障拉链和最后一部《夺宝奇兵》电影
item.description:
Why aren’t more things subject to recalls like cars are? Columnist Joe Queenan suggests some candidates, like the faulty zipper on his jacket and that last Indiana Jones movie https://t.co/LUJnGdrtQG https://t.co/LUJnGdrtQG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 尽管美国证券交易委员会（Securities and Exchange Commission）的气候规则遭到了广泛反对，但经过一些最终修改后，有一个群体似乎得到了大部分安抚：中小企业
item.description:
Though the Securities and Exchange Commission has faced widespread opposition to its climate rule, one group seems mostly placated after some final changes: small and medium-size businesses https://t.co/6vEr0xWblA https://t.co/6vEr0xWblA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 六名自称为 "打手小队 "的前密西西比州白人执法人员因一系列虐待行为，包括折磨两名黑人男子，于本周被判刑。
item.description:

item.title: 大韩航空（Korean Air Lines）表示，将与空中客车公司（Airbus）签订一份价值 137 亿美元的合同，采购 33 架喷气式飞机，以加强其长途机队，同时逐步淘汰老旧飞机。
item.description:
Korean Air Lines said it would sign a contract with Airbus to procure 33 jets in a deal valued at $13.7 billion, as the airline seeks to strengthen its long-haul fleet while it gradually retires older aircraft https://t.co/TEoh14GoOd https://t.co/TEoh14GoOd

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 知道我们离改写古老的历史总是差一个发现，这让人感到谦卑。这也令人振奋，@阿曼达-福尔曼博士写道
item.description:
It is humbling to know that we are always a discovery away from rewriting ancient history. It’s invigorating, too, writes @DrAmandaForeman https://t.co/rmaUhHRZlf https://t.co/rmaUhHRZlf

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 领导 FTX 破产的首席执行官指责这家失败的加密货币交易所的创始人山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）做出虚假陈述，以尽量减少因其 "巨大欺诈行为 "而被判处的监禁。
item.description:
The chief executive leading FTX through bankruptcy accused the failed crypto exchange’s founder, Sam Bankman-Fried, of making false statements to minimize the prison sentence for his “colossal fraud.” https://t.co/K3iAQ4COtf https://t.co/K3iAQ4COtf

item.title: 密西西比河港口小镇纳奇斯可能不在您的必游清单上。但是，对于那些追求美食、友好的人们以及对历史的冷静和不加修饰的审视的人来说，它应该是必到之地。
item.description:
Natchez, a small Mississippi River port town, may not be on your must-travel list. But for anyone after good food, friendly people and a sober, unglorified look at history, it should be. https://t.co/EXmpLWXmi0 https://t.co/EXmpLWXmi0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 21, 2024

item.title: 他说，他这样做是为了拯救以色列，因为他担心以色列正在失去美国的支持。"如果以色列成为一个遭人唾弃的国家，我不知道它能否生存下去"。
item.description:
I sat down with ⁦@SenSchumer⁩ to find out why he denounced @netanyahu⁩ in a high-stakes speech

He said he did it to save Israel, which he fears is losing support in America

“If Israel becomes a pariah state, I don’t know if it can survive” https://t.co/NXzn0MZJjv

— Lindsay Wise (@lindsaywise) March 21, 2024
